traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The rig is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the rig must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

traits.name: Unstable
entries: If the rig takes damage, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} with a speed of 0 until a creature activates it with a successful {@dc 10} Intelligence (Arcana) check made as an action.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The armor makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.
